title: Analysis: Confusion, but not panic, reigns in global finance in Russia's wake - Reuters.com
content: Analysis: Confusion, but not panic, reigns in global finance in Russia's wake  Reuters.com
description: Western alliesâ€™ sanctions against Russia have started to blow back in the form of large potential losses for their own banks, companies and investors, often in unexpected ways. In the past, such fires have been precursors to financial crises.
